full_text: UNITED STATES GOVERNMENT MEMORANDUM Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, New York DATE: 7/30/19 TO: DHO (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) FROM: SUBJECT: DHO Checklist/ EPSTEIN, JEFFREY EDWARD Reg. No.: 76318-054 The UDC refers this case to the DHO, all of the following is attached: PP44 - To determine if the inmate is GED "Sat or Unsat" PSDC - To determine the number and types of comps. PSDG- To determine the amount of available GCT for each Comp. PSSD- To determine the amount of SGT (if old law) PD15 - To determine frequency/ repetitive misconduct. PD16 - To determine if any suspended sanctions available to execute. BP 293 BP 294 Translator needed: No Yes, Language DOJ-OGR-00025273

text_blocks.content: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, New York
SUBJECT: DHO Checklist/ EPSTEIN, JEFFREY EDWARD Reg. No.: 76318-054
The UDC refers this case to the DHO, all of the following is attached:

PP44 - To determine if the inmate is GED "Sat or Unsat" PSDC - To determine the number and types of comps. PSDG- To determine the amount of available GCT for each Comp. PSSD- To determine the amount of SGT (if old law) PD15 - To determine frequency/ repetitive misconduct. PD16 - To determine if any suspended sanctions available to execute. BP 293 BP 294 Translator needed: No Yes, Language

additional_notes: The document contains redactions marked as (b)(6); (b)(7)(C). The document is a memorandum from the United States Government regarding Jeffrey Epstein.
